name: Outotsu Yume
description:
Outotsu Yume (凹凸夢) is a Yume Nikki Fangame built in RPG Maker 2003. In active development since 2015, Outotsu Yume is currently administrated by FD and Nex (who also help with the Yume Nikki Fangames Wiki.) The game stars two separate protagonists, the negative Kubotsuki and the positive Totsutsuki, and allows players to adventure through their dream worlds for effects or the thrill of exploration.

Since the game's release, we have worked with one goal in mind: an almost entirely collaborative experience in which the game is made up of the work of a wide variety of developers (akin to the monumental Yume 2kki, for those familiar with other fangames!) This is made doable primarily by a Discord server filled with developers, artists, musicians, coders, and people simply interested in playing!
